description: Troy is a surprising fellow. This skateboarder-type dude is into jewelery (believe me, I wouldn't make this up).Then, when you start chatting with him, you find out that his tattoos are all about eatern philosophy. Troy's maturity and in depth thinking made me fall in love with him. And, oh yeah, I almost forgot,he's got a superb body, nice biceps, perfect abs, and one largecock I'll have to suck one day.
title: Troy, Scene #01
